intervention_catalogue.name: Moving On
intervention_catalogue.short_description: Moving On is aimed at men on probation who are experiencing negative thoughts and feelings about themselves, associated with their offending and its consequences.
long_description: Moving On is aimed at men on probation who are experiencing negative thoughts and feelings about themselves, associated with their offending and its consequences.
These thoughts and feelings can be an emotional or psychological barrier to moving forward positively with their life. This can potentially obstruct desistance.
